item.title: WSJ Anonymous Hit Piece On Gabbard Is Based On Complaints That ‘Weren’t Credible’
item.description: 'Here’s the truth: There was no wrongdoing by @DNIGabbard, a fact that WSJ conveniently buried 13 paragraphs down,' a DNI official said.

item.title: Indiana Upgrades Immigration Bill As States Step Up To Boost Deportation Efforts

item.title: Thank Your Local ICE Agents For Their Service
item.description: Even when some make wrong decisions, ICE and CBP agents broadly deserve our honor and respect.

item.title: AI Rejects Truth And Virtue Because Our Culture Taught It To
item.description: Real truth and actual intelligence will never be 'artificial.'

item.title: Freedom 250 To Bring IndyCar Racing To D.C. Streets For America’s Birthday Bash
item.description: Just when you thought you had heard every possible joke about gridlock in Washington, along comes IndyCar to break up the monotony.
